iMessage Light Theme Example

This is an example of what channels will look like when this theme is applied

This Theme was Added with the 0.0.349 Pre-Alpha Update

This theme is a light version of the iMessage theme. It is designed to be easy on the eyes and provide a clean and modern look for your channels.

To use this theme, apply it to any ChitterHaven Channel or DM
